attributes.action: Request more support for parents who are left with children whose parents who are now residing in Spain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
More Support & help for the parents that are left with the children of whose parents have left to go to Spain & refuse to pay child maintenance when court orders are placed against them.
Spain seems one of the more 'laxed' part of Europe concerning the 'ex-pats' that choose to runaway from their responsibilties.
